Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI

Interface ObservableGUI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchipelagoPane, BoardPane, CharContainerPane, CloudContainerPane, GUIApplication, PlayerPane
public interface ObservableGUI
Interface common to all the GUI components that can be observed. Each observable can have an observer set so that it can be notified (through its methods) of an action taken.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setObserver(ObserverGUI observer)
    Sets the given observer to observe the GUI component.

  • Method Details

    • setObserver

      void setObserver(ObserverGUI observer)
      Sets the given observer to observe the GUI component.
      Parameters:
